Package com.intellij.codeInsight.editorActions.fillParagraph

Class ParagraphFillHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.codeInsight.editorActions.fillParagraph.ParagraphFillHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PyFillParagraphHandler, RestFillParagraphHandler

    public class ParagraphFillHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines general re-flow paragraph functionality. Serves plain text files. User : ktisha
